main event: On 8 May 1967, a small object was observed hovering in Cynthiana, Kentucky for about 5 minutes.
interesting points: The object was reported to be small and hovering without any apparent sound., The observation duration was confirmed to be approximately 5 minutes., There is a detailed description of the sighting provided in the document., The object was seen by multiple residents in the same area previously in December 1967., The witness noted the object appeared to disappear quickly into the trees.
